AssessmentTaskContentDocument.name: AssessmentTaskContentDocument
AssessmentTaskContentDocument.description: Associate content documents to visits, tasks, promotions, or planograms.

ContentContextId.description: ID of the attachment or file used as the content document for a custom object that is associated with a task. The IDs are validated against ActionPlanTemplateType.

ContentDocumentId.description: ID of the attachment or file used as the content document.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier of the content document.
